name: language-javascript-plus
description: Syntax highlighting for template strings in Atom

scripts.l: npm run rm && npm run cp && atom --clear-window-state .

author: Alexander Elias

taggedTemplateGrammar.title: JavaScript Tagged Template Literal Grammar Extensions
taggedTemplateGrammar.description: Enter a list of comma-separated expressions in the form `tagname:scope.name.of.grammar` where `tagname` is your tagged template language name, expressed as a literal (with no commas) or an (Oniguruma) regex (with no capturing groups) and where the scope name can be found in Atom preferences -> Packages -> (the `language-*` package of interest) under "Scope"
